## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Assembly of metagenomic sequencing data](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/microbiome/tutorials/metagenomics-assembly/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
